mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.user_id, f.product_id, f.create_time, p.id AS p_id, p.name AS p_name FROM favorite f JOIN product p ON p.id = f.product_id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY f.create_time DESC

SELECT f.id, f.user_id, f.product_id, f.create_time, p.id AS p_id, p.name AS p_name FROM favorite f JOIN product p ON p.id = f.product_id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} AND f.product_id = #{productId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorite (user_id, product_id, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, NOW())
